scripts.network: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet && UI_PORT=1420 concurrently "npm run build:watch -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet" "npm run start -w we" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cargo nextest run -j 1
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w we && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack ./workdir --recursive
scripts.prepare: curl -L --output DevHub.webhapp https://github.com/holochain/devhub-gui/releases/download/v0.12.0/DevHub.webhapp && mkdir src-tauri/bins && cp $(which holochain) src-tauri/bins/holochain-v0.1.3 && cp $(which lair-keystore) src-tauri/bins/lair-keystore-v0.2.3
